casebody.data:
GRIFFIN
v.
FREEMAN, et al. 322P15-7 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018

Mr. Raymond Alan Griffin, For Griffin, Raymond Alan

Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of March 2018 by Petitioner for Notice of Appeal of Writ of Mandamus Denial:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
